p: P. ginseng extracts did not inhibit the growth of P. aeruginosa PAO1 and its isogenic mucoid variant (PAO mucA22 or PDO300), but it did enhance extracellular protein production and stimulated the production of alginate. In addition, ginseng repressed the production of LasA and LasB and downregulated the synthesis of the N-acylated homoserine lactone factors [ 89].
